Activation Effect: Douse Fire.name: Activation Effect: Douse Fire
Activation Effect: Douse Fire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-item-activations.item-activations.Item.STS9lnXLFGYeCVpz]{Activation: Douse Fire}

Resistance 5 against fire and a +1 status bonus on your AC or saving throw against the fire effect targeting you; these benefits end as soon as the fire effect is resolved.

Activation Effect: Echoes of an Eerie Ta.name: Activation Effect: Echoes of an Eerie Tale
Activation Effect: Echoes of an Eerie Ta.description: The mists, whispers, and strange divots fade away at the end of the round, but any creature that takes mental damage from the effect also takes a -1 penalty to saving throws against effects with the emotion trait for 1 minute.

Activation Effect: Empty Death.name: Activation Effect: Empty Death
Activation Effect: Empty Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QT1jTPlf3ATYUh4I]{The Whispering Reeds}

Empty Death (curse, necromancy, occult)

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:27|traits:curse,necromancy]

Effect If you activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QT1jTPlf3ATYUh4I]{The Whispering Reeds} and are not a worshipper of Nhimbaloth, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 24 hours as your thoughts fill with paranoia that something is watching you from the other side of death. If you die while affected by the Empty Death, you immediately become a chaotic evil ghost. Every 7 days that pass after you become a ghost, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:2]— failure indicates that you are consumed by Nhimbaloth. A creature whose ghost is consumed in this way does not travel to the River of Souls and is utterly annihilated; this creature can only be restored to life via a 10th-level spell effect or ritual like @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish}.

Activation Effect: Through the Flames.name: Activation Effect: Through the Flames
Activation Effect: Through the Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-item-activations.item-activations.Item.mBoDXpeUodhvbhpb]{Activation: Through the Flames}

The ring's red gemstone flashes with light, granting you resistance 5 against fire and a +1 status bonus on your AC or saving throw against the fire effect targeting you; these benefits end as soon as the fire effect is resolved.
